mapper.select: SELECT s.stage AS stage, s.create_time AS createTime FROM construction_order c LEFT JOIN project_stage_log s ON s.order_no=c.order_no WHERE c.project_no=#{projectNo} AND s.type =#{type}
SELECT order_stage as taskStage, order_no as orderNo, type as styleType FROM construction_order WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}

SELECT ci.company_name AS constructionCompany, ps.task_num taskNum, deso.money as cost, ps.delay delay, ps.is_confirm isConfirm FROM construction_order deso LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON deso.company_id = ci.company_id LEFT JOIN project_scheduling ps ON ps.project_no=deso.project_no WHERE deso.project_no=#{projectNo} AND deso.status=#{status}

SELECT co.order_no orderNo, co.create_time createTime, co.close_time closeTime, co.order_stage orderStage, pro.order_source orderSource, pro.owner_id ownerId, pro.address_detail addressDetail, pro.house_type houseType, pro.decoration_budget decorationBudget, pro.house_room houseRoom, pro.house_office houseOffice, pro.house_toilet houseToilet, pro.area area, pro.style style, pro.reference_scheme referenceScheme, co.remark remark FROM construction_order co LEFT JOIN project pro ON co.project_no=pro.project_no WHERE co.project_no=#{projectNo}

SELECT dor.order_no AS sunOrderNo, dor.status AS status, p.project_no AS orderNo, p.order_source AS orderSource, pr.province_name AS orderAddress, po.contract_number AS contractNo, po.sign_time AS signingTime, po.audit_type AS auditType FROM construction_order dor LEFT JOIN project p ON p.project_no = dor.project_no LEFT JOIN pc_order_contract po ON po.order_number = dor.order_no LEFT JOIN province pr ON pr.province_code = p.province LEFT JOIN project_quotation_check pqc ON pqc.project_no=dor.project_no WHERE dor.company_id = #{constructionContractVO.companyId} AND dor.status = #{constructionContractVO.status} AND pqc.result = 1
and po.contract_number like CONCAT('%',#{constructionContractVO.contractNo},'%' )
and dor.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{constructionContractVO.orderNo},'%' )
and p.order_source like CONCAT('%',#{constructionContractVO.orderSource},'%' )
and pr.province_name like CONCAT('%',#{constructionContractVO.orderAddress},'%' )
and po.audit_type like CONCAT('%',#{constructionContractVO.auditType},'%' )
AND po.sign_time >= #{constructionContractVO.startSign}
AND po.sign_time <=#{constructionContractVO.endSign}
and po.audit_type = '1' and po.sign_time > now()
and ( po.audit_type = '0' or po.sign_time < now() )
ORDER BY dor.create_time DESC
limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageNum}
